description: This file defines a front-end component named 'Home' using the Lightning.js framework. It sets up a visual layout with animations, an image logo, loader, text, and a button, along with corresponding state management and lifecycle hooks.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A Lightning.js component representing the home page with animated logo, loader, text, and button.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Method to periodically cycle through predefined colors for visual effects.
